item.title: About me
item.description:
Hi, I’m Yoric, aka David Teller, I’m a Jack of all Threads at Mozilla and I produce code, speed, programming languages and performance data for a living.

I’ve been spotted spending time on

  • a micro-kernel;
  • a next-gen browser engine;
  • a few compilers;
  • static analyzers;
  • a few eBook readers;
  • IoT for the disabled;
  • IoT snooping countermeasure experiment;
  • pedagogic robots;
  • open-source mentoring;
  • university teaching;
  • high-school teaching;
  • academic research;
  • …

You can find my latest resume here.

If you wish to chat, try IRC (I’m Yoric on irc.mozilla.org). By e-mail, I’m D.O.MyLastName@gmail.com.
